title.rendered: REDARC SMART START BATTERY ISOLATOR & WIRING KIT 12V

content.rendered:
REDARC SMART START BATTERY ISOLATOR & WIRING KIT 12V

Redarc Smart Start Battery Isolator & Wiring Kit 12V available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

The Smart Start® Dual Battery Isolator and Wiring Kit (part number SBI12KIT) comes with everything required to install your Smart Start® Dual Battery Isolator including the Smart Start® itself.

Perfectly suited to the DIYer, the SBI12KIT requires no crimping or soldering, it’s just plug and play.

The SBI12KIT features high quality MTA 60 amp fuses and fuse holders with the corresponding ring terminals already attached to the wires.

Features

  • Prevents your secondary battery draining your main battery
  • Significantly extends battery life saving you money
  • Can be used in automotive and marine applications
  • Suitable for harsh environments
  • Easy to install complete kit
  • Full instruction booklet
CLICK HERE to view the full range of products available for your 4×4!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
